skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Slaanesh"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Slaanesh"

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.
All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.

	(accompanying Lord)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: No price is too small for the Gods.

	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

skillTree.localised_description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

skillTree.localised_description: When you can speak their language, convincing weak-willed mortals to give in to their base desires and gift their souls to Slaanesh is, unsurprisingly, quite an easy thing to do.

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab or gouge, it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This one's polished, perfectly glossy smoothness enables them to glide across land, sea or air, for they are truly favoured by the Dark Prince, and swift to do His bidding.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
